languages.text: "Жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает".

traits.locale_text: "Жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает".

languages.text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."
languages.original_text: "Жила-была девочка на куске камня, покрытом песком, в сердце которого таились несметные богатства для слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. И до шестнадцати лет эта девочка, надрывая легкие и спину, своими ручонками гребла блага для тех, кого никогда не видела и кто никогда о ней не узнает".

traits.locale_text: "Once upon a time there was a girl who lived on a sand-covered chunk of rock whose core held ungodly riches for the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out these riches with her little hands for those who never saw her and would never know or care until she was sixteen, breaking her back and coughing out her lungs every goddamn day."

"Once upon a time there was a girl who lived on a sand-covered chunk of rock whose core held ungodly riches for the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The girl scraped out these riches with her little hands for those who never saw her and would never know or care until she was sixteen, breaking her back and coughing out her lungs every goddamn day."

"Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

"Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

"Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

languages.text: “很久以前，有个小女孩住在一块被沙子覆盖的岩石上。而岩石的核心区域，为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人准备了不计其数的财富。那个女孩十六岁之前的每一天，都在努力地用她的小手回收那些财富。她的后背要累断了，肺里也灌满了沙子。她努力工作，仅仅是为了那些根本不会看她一眼，也不会知道她叫什么的人们。”
languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: “很久以前，有个小女孩住在一块被沙子覆盖的岩石上。而岩石的核心区域，为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人准备了不计其数的财富。那个女孩十六岁之前的每一天，都在努力地用她的小手回收那些财富。她的后背要累断了，肺里也灌满了沙子。她努力工作，仅仅是为了那些根本不会看她一眼，也不会知道她叫什么的人们。”

languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the Imperium. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

languages.text: «Hace mucho tiempo, había una niña pequeña que vivía en una roca cubierta de arena cuyo núcleo contenía riquezas sin fin para los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Y cada día hasta que cumplió los dieciséis, la niña excavó esas riquezas con sus manitas, destrozándose la espalda y tosiendo trocitos de pulmón para el beneficio de gente que jamás la había visto y jamás sabría su nombre».
languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: «Hace mucho tiempo, había una niña pequeña que vivía en una roca cubierta de arena cuyo núcleo contenía riquezas sin fin para los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Y cada día hasta que cumplió los dieciséis, la niña excavó esas riquezas con sus manitas, destrozándose la espalda y tosiendo trocitos de pulmón para el beneficio de gente que jamás la había visto y jamás sabría su nombre».

languages.text: 「昔々、砂に覆われた岩の塊の上に住んでいた少女がいた。その岩の核には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべのための計り知れない富が詰まっているとされていた。少女はその小さな手で富をかき出し、背中を壊し、肺を咳き込みながら、彼女を見たこともなく、彼女の名前を知ることもない人々のために働いた。彼女は16歳になるまで毎日そうしていた」
languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: 「昔々、砂に覆われた岩の塊の上に住んでいた少女がいた。その岩の核には、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のしもべのための計り知れない富が詰まっているとされていた。少女はその小さな手で富をかき出し、背中を壊し、肺を咳き込みながら、彼女を見たこともなく、彼女の名前を知ることもない人々のために働いた。彼女は16歳になるまで毎日そうしていた」

languages.text: "Es war einmal ein kleines Mädchen, das lebte auf einem sandbedeckten Felsen, und der Kern dieses Felsens enthielt atemberaubende Reichtümer für Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Und bis zu seinem sechzehnten Geburtstag kratzte das Mädchen diese Reichtümer mit den kleinen Händen aus dem Boden und zerstörte sich dabei den Rücken und die Lungen für Leute, die sie noch nie gesehen hatten und niemals ihren Namen kennen würden."
languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: "Es war einmal ein kleines Mädchen, das lebte auf einem sandbedeckten Felsen, und der Kern dieses Felsens enthielt atemberaubende Reichtümer für Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Und bis zu seinem sechzehnten Geburtstag kratzte das Mädchen diese Reichtümer mit den kleinen Händen aus dem Boden und zerstörte sich dabei den Rücken und die Lungen für Leute, die sie noch nie gesehen hatten und niemals ihren Namen kennen würden."

languages.text: « Il était une fois une petite fille qui vivait sur une planète couverte de sable dont le noyau renfermait des richesses incommensurables pour les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Elle s'échinait à longueur de journée en crachant ses poumons pour extraire ces richesses avec ses petites mains, dans l'intérêt de gens qui n'avaient jamais posé les yeux sur elle et ne connaîtraient jamais son nom. Ainsi se déroulait sa vie jour après jour, jusqu'à ce qu'elle atteigne l'âge de seize ans. »
languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: « Il était une fois une petite fille qui vivait sur une planète couverte de sable dont le noyau renfermait des richesses incommensurables pour les serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Elle s'échinait à longueur de journée en crachant ses poumons pour extraire ces richesses avec ses petites mains, dans l'intérêt de gens qui n'avaient jamais posé les yeux sur elle et ne connaîtraient jamais son nom. Ainsi se déroulait sa vie jour après jour, jusqu'à ce qu'elle atteigne l'âge de seize ans. »

languages.text: "Bir varmış bir yokmuş, içi tıka basa kum dolu bir kayanın içinde yaşayan küçük bir kız varmış. Bu kayanın tam ortasında da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} hizmetkârları için akla hayale gelmeyecek hazineler saklıymış. On altı yaşına kadar kızın ömrü; kendisini bir kez olsun görmemiş, ismini asla bilmeyecek kişiler için o küçük elleriyle bu hazineleri çıkarmakla, sırtını parlamakla, ciğerleri çıkarcasına öksürmekle geçmiş."
languages.original_text: "Once upon a time, there was a little girl who lived on a sand-covered lump of rock, and the core of that rock contained untold riches for servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And every day until she turned sixteen, the girl scraped out those riches with her little hands, breaking her back and coughing up her lungs, on behalf of people who had never clapped eyes upon her and who would never know her name."

traits.locale_text: Bir varmış bir yokmuş, içi tıka basa kum dolu bir kayanın içinde yaşayan küçük bir kız varmış. Bu kayanın tam ortasında da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un hizmetkârları için akla hayale gelmeyecek hazineler bulunurmuş. On altı yaşına kadar kızın ömrü, onu bir kez olsun görmemiş, onun ismini asla bilmeyecek kişiler için o küçük elleriyle hazineler çıkarmakla, sırtını parlamakla, ciğerleri çıkarcasına öksürmekle geçmiş."
